idioma: Yo he aprendido mucho acerca de autores modernos.

idioma: Nunca he confiado en él y nunca lo haré.

idioma: Nunca he confiado en ti y nunca lo haré.

idioma: Solo he oído una vez a Tom tocar el piano.

idioma: Si no te gusta, no comas.

traduccion: If you go fishing tomorrow, I will, too.

idioma: Si vas a pescar mañana, yo también voy.

idioma: Si no tienes nada que decir, no digas nada.
traduccion: If you have nothing to say, say nothing.

traduccion: After the war, Britain had many colonies.

traduccion: All my friends came to my birthday party.

traduccion: All of a sudden, all the lights went out.

traduccion: All of a sudden, my mother began to sing.

idioma: Todas las flores del jardín son amarillas.

traduccion: All three of my sons were born in Boston.

idioma: Lo único que tienes que hacer es limpiar tu cuarto.

idioma: Aunque es joven, él es muy cuidadoso.

traduccion: Americans admire Lincoln for his honesty.

idioma: Un viejo castillo se encuentra en la cima del acantilado.

traduccion: And he let the two men sleep at his home.

traduccion: Animals act according to their instincts.

idioma: Cualquier cosa que digas puede ser usada en tu contra.

traduccion: Are you going to get a job this semester?

traduccion: Are you going to go anywhere this summer?

traduccion: Are you going to invite her to the party?

traduccion: Are you wondering what we ended up doing?

traduccion: Are your friends Portuguese or Brazilian?

traduccion: As a result of the war, many people died.

idioma: Lo que es yo, no tengo ninguna queja.
traduccion: As for me, I have nothing to complain of.

traduccion: As it is, prices are going up every week.

traduccion: As soon as he went out, it began to rain.

idioma: Pídele a Tom que me llame tan pronto como regrese.
traduccion: Ask Tom to call me as soon as he returns.

idioma: Al principio, te confundí con tu hermano.
traduccion: At first, I mistook you for your brother.

idioma: Al mediodía, almuerzo con mis compañeros.
